text: Segundo Leonidas Iza Salazar (born 18 June 1982) is an Ecuadorian activist and indigenous leader of Kichwa-Panzaleo ancestry. In 2021, he was elected President of the Confederation of Indigenous Nationalities of Ecuador (CONAIE). Before this, he was a well known leader of the October 2019 national protests against the government of Len√≠n Moreno. He is running for President of Ecuador in the 2025 general election. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:Ecuadorian politicians Category:Ecuadorian activists
title: Leonidas Iza
